8e67d6b0-07ab-4b5e-a98b-1b4988941db5.description: The “Python Knight" digital badge is a professional credential that demonstrates the individual's ability to accomplish basic coding tasks in the Python language. It shows that the individual is familiar with fundamental terms and definitions, Python logic and structure, literal variables and numeral systems, operators, data types, I/O operations, control flow, data collections, functions, exceptions, syntax, semantics, and the runtime environment.
8e67d6b0-07ab-4b5e-a98b-1b4988941db5.name: Python Knight

issuer.summary: issued by University IT Technology Training, Stanford University

entity.name: University IT Technology Training, Stanford University

badge_template_activities.title: Successfully completed the Python I: Fundamentals - Entry-Level Python Programmer Certification workshop.
